rooms.description: Open space with reception area and storage. Designed to ensure smooth flow according to Vastu principles by orienting entrance in the north-east direction.
Mediterranean style living room with open space for family gatherings. Features natural ventilation and daylight through large windows oriented east to catch morning light.
Modern kitchen with efficient work triangle layout, positioned in the southeast corner for balanced energy. Utilizes cost-effective local materials.
Separate servant's quarters integrated into ground floor with essential facilities and access to service balcony.
Adjacent to the living room for relaxation. Features cost-effective design elements in Mediterranean style.

openings.description: Main entrance door ensuring Vastu compliance with north-east alignment.
Windows placed to maximize natural light and ventilation.
